WorkflowInfo.Name: Monitor URL using IP Address
WorkflowInfo.Description: Monitor URL using specific IP address by changing the hosts file on each iteration
WorkflowInfo.Xoml:
<SequentialWorkflowActivity x:Name="CustomWorkflow" xmlns:ns0="clr-namespace:ExitWhile;Assembly=ExitWhile, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/workflow" x:Class="WorkflowDesignerControl.CustomWorkflow"> <WhileActivity x:Name="whileActivity1" Condition="{x:Null}"> <SequenceActivity x:Name="sequenceActivity3"> <ns0:ExitWhile IsValid="True" x:Name="exitWhile1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Counter="2" Description="Exit current while activity" DisplayName="Exit While" TypeName="ExitWhile" /> <ns1:URLCheck SrcPassword="" Proxy="" TimeInSeconds="0" TextToSearch="Critcal" DisplayName="URL Check" IsValid="True" SiteId="0" Password="" TypeName="URLCheck" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" SiteName="Default Site" Description="Search a phrase in the specified URL" SrcUserName="" x:Name="urlCheck1" Timeout="00:01:00" UserName="" ProxyUrls="" isChecked="False" byPass="False" Url="http://www.ayehu.com" /> <IfElseActivity x:Name="ifElseActivity2"> <IfElseBranchActivity x:Name="ifElseBranchActivity4"> <ns2:ReturnValue Value="Success" IsValid="True" x:Name="returnValue4" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" ConditionName="" UseBranchWhenTimeout="False" UseStoredValue="True" ConditionType="" DisplayName="Return Value" Formula="=Equals(&&&,Success)" Description="Use a returned value of a previous activity." ConditionNumber="-1" UseCustomeCondition="False" Type="StoredValue" TypeName="ReturnValue" /> <ns3:ReadFile Password="" HostName="LocalHost" DisplayName="Read File" IsValid="True" HostId="1" Path="c:\windows\system32\drivers\etc\hosts" ReadingDirection="Top" TypeName="ReadFile" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Read the file in the specified path." ConditionNumber="-1" UseCustomeCondition="False" Type="UserDefinedValue" TypeName="ReturnValue" /> <ns8:ReplaceString IsValid="True" x:Name="replaceString1" RemoveNewLines="False" FindString="10.10.10.1" Timeout="00:01:00" ReplaceWithString="10.10.10.2" SourceString="%readFile1%" IsMatchCase="False" RemoveSpaces="False" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Find and replace a string with another string" RemoveTabs="False" DisplayName="Replace String" TypeName="ReplaceString" /> </IfElseBranchActivity> <IfElseBranchActivity x:Name="ifElseBranchActivity2"> <ns2:ReturnValue Value="10.10.10.2" IsValid="True" x:Name="returnValue2" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" ConditionName="" UseBranchWhenTimeout="True" UseStoredValue="False" ConditionType="Contains" DisplayName="Return Value" Formula="=Contains("&&&","10.10.10.2")" Description="Use a returned value of a previous activity." ConditionNumber="-1" UseCustomeCondition="False" Type="UserDefinedValue" TypeName="ReturnValue" /> <ns8:ReplaceString IsValid="True" x:Name="replaceString2" RemoveNewLines="False" FindString="10.10.10.2" Timeout="00:01:00" ReplaceWithString="10.10.10.1" SourceString="%readFile1%" IsMatchCase="False" RemoveSpaces="False" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Find and replace a string with another string" RemoveTabs="False" DisplayName="Replace String" TypeName="ReplaceString" /> </IfElseBranchActivity> </IfElseActivity> <ns4:ConvertToPlainText Value="%readFile1%" IsValid="True" x:Name="convertToPlainText1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Convert a ResultSet to plain text." DisplayName="Convert to Plain Text" TypeName="ConvertToPlainText" /> <ns5:WriteFile IsValid="True" x:Name="writeFile1" HostName="LocalHost" TimeInSeconds="0" NewValue="%convertToPlainText1%" Timeout="00:01:00" DisplayName="Write File" Path="c:\windows\system32\drivers\etc\hosts" IsAppend="False" Password="" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Write text to a file" HostId="1" TypeName="WriteFile" UserName="" /> <ns6:Wait IsValid="True" x:Name="wait1" TimeInterval="" isDefault="0" DisplayName="Wait" TimeInSeconds="120" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Pause workflow" TypeName="Wait" TimeValue="" Timeout="00:02:00" /> </IfElseBranchActivity> <IfElseBranchActivity x:Name="ifElseBranchActivity5"> <ns2:ReturnValue Value="Failure" IsValid="True" x:Name="returnValue5" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" ConditionName="" UseBranchWhenTimeout="True" UseStoredValue="True" ConditionType="" DisplayName="Return Value" Formula="=Equals(&&&,Failure)" Description="Use a returned value of a previous activity." ConditionNumber="-1" UseCustomeCondition="False" Type="StoredValue" TypeName="ReturnValue" /> <ns3:ReadFile Password="" HostName="LocalHost" DisplayName="Read File" IsValid="True" HostId="1" Path="c:\windows\system32\drivers\etc\hosts" ReadingDirection="Top" TypeName="ReadFile" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Read the file in the specified path." TimeInSeconds="0" x:Name="readFile2" LinesToRead="" LineFilter="http://ayehu.com" UserName="" Timeout="00:01:00" /> <ns4:ConvertToPlainText Value="%readFile2%" IsValid="True" x:Name="convertToPlainText2" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Convert a ResultSet to plain text." DisplayName="Convert to Plain Text" TypeName="ConvertToPlainText" /> <ns7:SendEmail Channel="0" TimeInSeconds="0" Subject="Unable to reach URL using the following IP address %convertToPlainText2%" DestinationNumber="1" x:Name="sendEmail1" TemplateNumber="0" ShiftLevel="" IsValid="True" HostId="-2" TemplateName="" TypeName="SendEmail" SendRN="False" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" DestinationTypeCc="User" DestinationType="User" HostName="{x:Null}" Timeout="00:00:00" DisplayName="Send Email" Attachments="" Cc="" Description="Send an email to a user, a group or a duty." Continue="False" DestinationNumberCc="0" Body="<!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.0 Transitional//EN">
<HTML><HEAD>
<META content="text/html; charset=utf-8" http-equiv=Content-Type>
<META name=GENERATOR content="MSHTML 11.00.9600.16476"></HEAD>
<BODY style="BACKGROUND-COLOR: white">Unable to reach URL using the following IP 
address %convertToPlainText2% </BODY></HTML>
" To="Admin" ShiftLevelCc="" MessageType="Custom" /> </IfElseBranchActivity> </IfElseActivity> </SequenceActivity> </WhileActivity> </SequentialWorkflowActivity>
WorkflowInfo.Details: This process monitors the availability of a website from a specific IP address. Use this process to check the availability when you are using a load balancer. The process checks if the website is available, and in case it is not the IP address the host is configured to run from is sent to Admin. In case the website is available, the process edits the IP address in the hosts file to check from another address.
